name: 摩根·李
birth_place: 美国.伊利诺伊州.芝加哥
introduction: 2016 AVN Best New Starlet NomineeMorgan Lee was introduced to the industry by performer Spencer Scott, whom Lee met when they were both studying hairstyling. She trains for competitive MMA fighting, and "basketball is my thing. Sports and food. I love food. Baking and cooking. And watching other people make food." She also enjoys archeology and astronomy, and, "I'm really big into museums."Two things she likes about working in adult are "traveling and meeting people. Some of the people I've met—colleagues—are really good people. They've been super sweet to me, I get along with them great. I enjoy it a lot. I go and party for fun and get paid."She wants to work in big parodies, something like Wolf of Wall Street or 300.Born in Omaha, the slender performer has tattooed stars on her hips, kanji characters on her back and a dragon on her wrist, as well as a navel piercing. She goes by the philosophy, "Live life to the fullest with no regrets. It's one of those quotes that really sticks out for me."
